channel.title: When will there be more axolotis? (update: preorder available now)
channel.description: When will there be more Axoloti boards? Can't find any contact info of the developers. I orderd a ton of knobs and got a beautifull casing... really wanna order it now :slight_smile: Alain Holand

item.title: When will there be more axolotis? (update: preorder available now)
item.dc:creator: @brasso Marc BrassÃ©
item.description:
@brasso wrote:

Great news! I put my order in as soon as I found out.

But please explain: Going to Superbooth AND building Axoloti's? Do you maybe, just like Santa Claus, have some midgets soldering in a sweatshop somewhere?

Read full topic

item.title: When will there be more axolotis? (update: preorder available now)
item.dc:creator: @scitoast
item.description:
@scitoast wrote:

Terribly sorry, yes of course it is a big job to maintain, organize and do logistics for all this, and the Axoloti device...well it is a brilliant technology and I would happily wait for a year to get hands on a second one . Thank you Johannes and everyone for the update!!

Read full topic
item.source: When will there be more axolotis? (update: preorder available now)

item.title: When will there be more axolotis? (update: preorder available now)
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

Axoloti will be back in stock somewhere next week if no showstoppers show up.
Yes, I've been very busy and unresponsive lately, I apologize... I wanted to have reasonable certainty on the "when..." question myself, rather than making hypothetical statements...

I have enabled orders in the webshop again, though they will be classified as backorders until I have real stock flowing in.

Read full topic
item.source: When will there be more axolotis? (update: preorder available now)

item.title: When will there be more axolotis? (update: preorder available now)
item.dc:creator: @alainkalender alain
item.description:
@alainkalender wrote:

Nice, the guy does deserve a vacation haha.
Really cool product and can't wait untill they get back in stock!

Read full topic
item.source: When will there be more axolotis? (update: preorder available now)

item.title: When will there be more axolotis? (update: preorder available now)
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

ah , fair enough, I incorrectly assumed this was a reference to the other thread ( which I should have probably merged, so that the information was in one place), apologies if this was incorrect.

as you say, a bit of patience is needed, Johannes has a lot on his plate (software, firmware, production, shipping, logistics, support).. I'm sure he is doing his best, and also some elements will be outside his control.

Read full topic
item.source: When will there be more axolotis? (update: preorder available now)

item.title: When will there be more axolotis? (update: preorder available now)
item.dc:creator: @watsoninc HGM
item.description:
@watsoninc wrote:

Hi Mark (@thetechnobear) ,
I guess @scitoast was referring to the date when the OP started the thread 14 days ago. Please be patient with us, as we are just eager to get our hands on an Axoloti board. Unfortunately, the information flow by Johannes has been very sparse during the last weeks, as he did neither respond here nor via PM. Hence, people are getting a bit impatient I guess.

Best,
Hanno

Read full topic
item.source: When will there be more axolotis? (update: preorder available now)

item.title: When will there be more axolotis? (update: preorder available now)
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

no, its not been 2 weeks, i said this 9 days ago...
and as i clearly stated, this was not official, Johannes said he was 'working on a date' , which i took to mean that he was probably waiting on a 3rd party before being able to commit to a date.
(i only requested this 'timeframe' to give users an idea if it was weeks or months, as id had a few people PM me.)

I've not talked to Johannes since, so I've no idea if this is still the 'hoped for' timeframe or not, perhaps something has held it up.

I'm sure once he knows when he can deliver new boards he will pop by and say when new boards are going to be available... I'm sure he'd love to supply boards as soon as possible.

Read full topic
item.source: When will there be more axolotis? (update: preorder available now)
